attributes.action: A new referendum on re-joining the European Union must be offered to the people.
attributes.additional_details:
The government MUST call a halt to this and save the economy and the Union, by re-joining the EU, we need to be strong together and cut out this petty nationalism. Yes be proud to be English, Scottish, Welsh or Irish BUT TOGETHER and with our European partners and allies we form a strong economic bond that has real gravitas in the World.
On our own I fear the worst for our economy and survival. We must have a chance to reverse this decision and Work together for a better future.
attributes.background: If we carry on down this disastrous road, it will result in the break up of the Union. Scotland will gain independence and re-join the EU. Northern Ireland will reunite with Eire and become part of the EU. Leaving England and Wales on their own in a World of economic Giants. Brexit has TO STOP NOW!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Referendum on re-joining the EU
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550951
